meta.title: Palermo Alessio | LLM Expert
meta.description: Portfolio di Alessio Palermo, Software AI Engineer specializzato in LLM, Machine Learning e sviluppo hardware. Scopri progetti innovativi e competenze tecniche.

it.name: Palermo Alessio
it.title: LLM Specialist
it.about-content: Fin dai tempi della scuola, sviluppo progetti autonomi in software e hardware. Oggi mi occupo soprattutto di AI applicata: lavoro con Large Language Models (LLM) e architetture RAG, progetto agenti AI e automazioni su misura. Unisco un background operativo in telecomunicazioni e automazione industriale alla capacità di tradurre esigenze reali in soluzioni tecniche misurabili.
it.footer: © 2024 Palermo Alessio. Tutti i diritti riservati.

items: Consulente Tecnico AI e Machine Learning — Consulenza, Marzo 2023 – Presente.
Tecnico Senior Telecomunicazioni — Solutions30, Venaria, Marzo 2022 – Presente.
Giuntista Fibra Ottica — Varie aziende (Telimasud, Aura, GDTelecomunicazioni), Aprile 2019 – Febbraio 2022.
Tecnico Manutentore Elettrico / Installatore Macchine Industriali — TEKNOENGINEERING SRL / GAMI, Agosto 2020 – Ottobre 2021.
Attivatore Delivery FTTH — NewTel, Collegno, Agosto 2018 – Aprile 2019.

AI & Machine Learning: Modelli Linguistici (GPT-4, Gemini, LLaMA, Mistral, ...), Reti Neurali, Apprendimento Supervisionato e Non, NLP, Computer Vision (principi), Prompt Engineering, RAG, Fine-Tuning, Architetture Server MCP.
Linguaggi di Programmazione: Python, C/C++, C#, Java, JavaScript.
Framework e Librerie: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Google ADK, Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy, FastAPI.
Cloud & DevOps: Google Cloud Platform (AI Studio, Vertex AI), Google Workspace, Jupyter, Docker, Git, GitHub, VS Code.
Database: PostgreSQL, SQLite, Vector Databases.
Sistemi e Altro: Linux (ArchLinux), Windows, Android, Apple, Programmazione PLC, Reti TLC, Automazione Industriale.

meta.title: Palermo Alessio | LLM Expert
meta.description: Portfolio of Alessio Palermo, Software AI Engineer specialized in LLM, Machine Learning and hardware development. Discover innovative projects and technical skills.

en.name: Palermo Alessio
en.title: LLM Specialist
en.about-content: Since school, I've been building autonomous software and hardware projects. Today I focus on applied AI: Large Language Models (LLM), RAG architectures, AI agents and custom automations. I bring a hands-on background in telecommunications and industrial automation, translating real needs into measurable technical solutions.

items: AI & Machine Learning Technical Consultant — Consulting, March 2023 – Present.
Senior Telecommunications Technician — Solutions30, Venaria, March 2022 – Present.
Fiber Optic Jointer — Various (Telimasud, Aura, GDTelecomunicazioni), April 2019 – February 2022.
Electrical Maintenance Technician / Industrial Machine Installer — TEKNOENGINEERING SRL / GAMI, August 2020 – October 2021.
FTTH Delivery Activator — NewTel, Collegno, August 2018 – April 2019.

AI & Machine Learning: Language Models (GPT-4, Gemini, LLaMA, Mistral, ...), Neural Networks, Supervised & Unsupervised Learning, NLP, basic Computer Vision, Prompt Engineering, RAG, Fine-Tuning, MCP Server Architectures.
Programming Languages: Python, C/C++, C#, Java, JavaScript.
Frameworks & Libraries: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Google ADK, scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy, FastAPI.
Cloud & DevOps: Google Cloud Platform (AI Studio, Vertex AI), Google Workspace, Jupyter, Docker, Git, GitHub, VS Code.
Databases: PostgreSQL, SQLite, Vector Databases.
Systems & Other: Linux (ArchLinux), Windows, Android, Apple, PLC programming, Telecommunications networks, Industrial automation.
